About me

Hi again! My name is Bruno Santos (in case you haven't seen the 100px sized name on the front) and I'm a Digital Designer from Lisbon who loves to explore, experiment and have fun with the web.


Design, Multidisciplinarity, Experimentation, Code and the ability to Google my way into anything are my best traits. I really want to get design and interaction in the hands of people and those are my best tools to get there.
Even though I've done them, boring websites or apps with "pre-formatted" design aren't it for me — there is a time and a place for them — but I believe that regarding digital design of course we should try to have fun by breaking as many rules and abusing our endless platforms as much as possible.


Currently (as of June 2019), I just finished my Postgraduate in Digital Experience Design and I'm looking for new challenges to grow as a designer in the field. Let me know if you're looking for me!
